item.title: ESP32 AM312 motion sensor automation
item.description: DIY 5 minutes : Connect esp32 to the motion sensor am312 and create an automation. In the last article, we’ve seen how to turn on/off the smart light depending on the presence of your smartwatch. In this article, we will see how to turn on/off the light using the PIR motion sensor AM312. Requirements Before starting the tutorial, you should have these materials.
